ComicInfo.Title: One Balmy Day on a Desert Island; Separate Sections at the Ballpark!; Columbum; Beam Us Up, Scotty!; Pow!; A Crummy Affair; Confessions of a Party Dog; The Musketteers; A Sad Day in Megalopolis; Lover's Lane; Whiners & Losers Who Draw Badly!; One Partly Cloudy Day Downtown; Fairy Tale Characters Then.. and Now...; Having a Wonderful Time; Guillotine Gags!; Attacked by Alligator; Star Drek the Next Generation; Great Moments in History Not in History Books; One Summer's Day in Bayonne; Sherlock Holmes vs Jack the Ripper; Peter Pan Reads a Bedtime Story
ComicInfo.Summary:
While escaping prison Hudd and Dini are attacked by an alligator who turns out to be the guard wearing a disguise.
Peter Pan crushes Tinkerbell between the pages of a book.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:44:11. [Issue ID 250608]

ComicInfo.Penciller: Don Orehek,Don Martin,Bill Ward,Wally Brogan,Mike Ricigliano,Pat Boyette,Frank Caruso,Gary Fields,Bill Wray,Henry Boltinoff,Rob Orzechowski,Vic Martin,John Severin
ComicInfo.Inker: Don Orehek,Don Martin,Bill Ward,Wally Brogan,Mike Ricigliano,Pat Boyette,Frank Caruso,Gary Fields,Bill Wray,Henry Boltinoff,Rob Orzechowski,Vic Martin,John Severin
